reusable.name: Log In
reusable.step: I click on the "Sign in with Auth0" button
I click on the "Login" button which is "2"
I should be redirected to the "Product Factory" page

reusable.name: Create Body Financial Dimension
reusable.step: I click on the "Financial Dimensions" link
I fill the "Code" PF field with "EC_FD_CODE"
I fill the "Description" PF field with "EC_FD_DESC"
